metadata.title: CVE-2024-26764 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: fs/aio:Restrict kiocb_set_cancel_fn() to I/O submitted via libaio Ifkiocb_set_cancel_fn() is called for I/O submitted via io_uring, thefollowing kernel warning appears: WARNING: CPU: 3 PID: 368 at fs/aio.c:598kiocb_set_cancel_fn+0x9c/0xa8 Call trace: kiocb_set_cancel_fn+0x9c/0xa8ffs_epfile_read_iter+0x144/0x1d0 io_read+0x19c/0x498io_issue_sqe+0x118/0x27c io_submit_sqes+0x25c/0x5fc__arm64_sys_io_uring_enter+0x104/0xab0 invoke_syscall+0x58/0x11cel0_svc_common+0xb4/0xf4 do_el0_svc+0x2c/0xb0 el0_svc+0x2c/0xa4el0t_64_sync_handler+0x68/0xb4 el0t_64_sync+0x1a4/0x1a8 Fix this by settingthe IOCB_AIO_RW flag for read and write I/O that is submitted by libaio.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26764` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-112-generic - 5.15.0-112.122
linux-image-5.15.0-112-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-112.122
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-112-generic - 5.15.0-112.122
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-112-generic-64k - 5.15.0-112.122
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1060-kvm - 5.15.0-1060.65
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1063-aws - 5.15.0-1063.69
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1062-gcp - 5.15.0-1062.70
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1060-gke - 5.15.0-1060.66
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1046-gkeop - 5.15.0-1046.53
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1056-ibm - 5.15.0-1056.59
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1058-intel-iotg - 5.15.0-1058.64
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-110-lowlatency - 5.15.0-110.120
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-110-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-110.120
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1058-nvidia - 5.15.0-1058.59
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1058-nvidia-lowlatency - 5.15.0-1058.59
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required
